title: Review Patient Growth Chart
description: A pediatrician is seeing a child for a well-child visit and needs to review their growth chart for any abnormalities.

tasks.expected_outcome: Pediatrician accesses the correct patient record.

tasks.description: Navigate to the growth chart section of the EHR.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays the patient's height, weight, and BMI plotted against standard percentile curves.

tasks.description: Observe that the patient's weight percentile has crossed two major percentile lines, indicating a potential issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The visual display of the data allows the pediatrician to quickly identify a clinically significant trend.
